datasets.name: Connected Vehicle Pilot Open Data Story
datasets.description: Calling all ITS and Traffic Safety Researchers - discover CV Pilot Open Data, the research tools and support available, and ways you can access them to support your projects.
datasets.altText: Cars passing through an intersection with yellow rings around each car indicating connectivity.

datasets.name: Work Zone Data Exchange (WZDx) Feed Registry and Archive
datasets.description: Discover multiple work zone data feeds, datasets, visualizations, and other tools to support your data projects.
datasets.altText: Cars passing through a road work zone with a visualization of information being sent to cars via work zone machines.

datasets.name: Next Generation Simulation (NGSIM) Open Data
datasets.description: A brief overview of the NGSIM program data collection as well as what types of NGSIM data are available on ITS DataHub.
datasets.altText: Overhead view of cars moving along a highway with green dots indicating a vehicle being detected by the program

draft.name: Intersection Safety Challenge Stage 1B Data
draft.description: Explore the data used in the Intersection Safety Challenge Stage 1B Competition.
draft.altText: Traffic lights with a sunset in the background
